virtual void glr::glw::IGraphicsObject::pushToVideoMemory ( )
pure virtual

Will stream the latest graphics data into opengl memory.

Implemented in glr::glw::IAnimation, glr::glw::Mesh, glr::glw::Material, glr::glw::Texture2D, glr::glw::Texture2DArray, glr::terrain::TerrainMesh, and glr::glw::Animation.
